full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DKOR SGRIB SBYONGS THABS ZAB MO BRUL GTOR GTONG TSUL 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS 'DON CHA NYUNG BA'I 'KHYER BDE ZHIG GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BAN RGAN NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS, ,PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA LAS BSDUS TE SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BLO BZANG NYI MA'O, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
